name: Like You - Saint Rien Official Music Video

metadata.name: Like You - Saint Rien (Official Music Video)
metadata.description:
This is the 2nd Music Video NFT from Saint Rien.

Like You was one of the funnest videos to create!   The song and video is an insight into my young, substance-filled journey from being a hopeless romantic who didn’t believe in love. To finding my soulmate years later. 

From passion to attachment, drama, and betrayal, I wanted to build the song around the line; “I can fall in love with someone… hmmm, like you.’ Alternating between light heartedness or sarcasm and a more profound unveiling of the fact that I used to put myself through hell for someone, anyone to love me.  

The second half of the song and video depicts the death of my former self and my new life (in heaven) with my now wife, Stephanie. We met a month before I was to move to America and after doing long distance for 6 months, I proposed. Three years later we’re happier than ever. 

If you purchase this NFT you will get: 

- The full original script used. In hard copy or digital download.
- A 1/1 Call with Saint Rien
- A free mint of a very cool upcoming project coming soon ;)

Peace.

Written, Directed and Produced by Saint Rien
Director of Photography - Daniel Chaney
Editor - Daniel Chaney
Talent - Stephanie Flockhart, Brendan Hayes, Mary Kathryn Kopp, Andy Dunkin
Art - Annie Liliholm
